FuncDef: This command defines the action to be executed when the idle-timeout is reached. The action is performed for all hosts associated with the sla-profile instance.

ParaDef.Info: Performs a subscriber host connectivity verification check (IPoE hosts only).
Deletes the subscriber host from the system: for PPP hosts, a terminate request is send; for IPoE hosts a DHCP release is send to the DHCP server.
